title: CLOUDAIR Womens Platform Sandal - Cooper Open Toe Slides Sandals for All Your Fashion Needs - Summer Casual Slip-on Platform Sandals for Indoor & Outdoor - Cushioned Thick Sole
features: CUSHIONED FOOTBED: Feel like you are stepping on clouds with a comfortable footbed. These black platform sandals are padded and their contoured comfort footbed will mold the shape of your foot, so you'll be able to walk around all day with ease anywhere, and keep your feet comfortable and pain-free.

ADJUSTABLE BUCKLE: Our women’s sandals have an adjustable double strap with a buckle, so you can adjust the buckle freely to fit your instep perfectly. The buckles of our platform sandal are made with strong material that will last forever.

ANTI-SLIP SANDALS: These platform sandals are lightweight, flexible, and durable. The durable anti-slip outsole gives your feet a perfect grip and you don't have to worry during outdoor activities with its unique pattern on the outsole.

OPEN TOE DESIGN: Our platform sandals for women have an open toe design so you can show off your stunning pedicure. This platform sandal can add an extra height to make you look slimmer, and comfortable for a walk and benefit those who cannot wear heels for a long time.

PAIR UP WITH EVERY OUTFIT: Whether you wear shorts, jeans, T-shirts, or cute skirts, these women fashion sandals make a simple outfit look instantly fashionable. Suitable for daily wearing, walking, shopping, indoor and outdoor, etc.
description: Comfy Trendy and Versatile Sandals for all your summer needs;

Super cute summer platform sandals. The high sole design makes your look more elegant, and keeps your feet comfortable all the day. The sole is made of high-quality rubber material, and the surface of the sole is composed of dense vertical stripes, which can enhance the friction with the ground so that you can walk on all kinds of ground without worrying about falling down.
✓ Super Comfortable ✓ Buckle Adjustment ✓ Open Toe Design ✓ Manmade Upper Leather ✓ High Rubber Non-Slip Sole

Summer is coming, when will it be better not to wear open toes at this time? Dispelling the heat and bringing you an infinite sense of refreshment with these open toe women's sandals. Slip-on walking slides sandals can be easily put on or take off without collapsing.

The slip on design of our platform sandal is more convenient to put on and take off. The traction sole of these black platform sandals provides you extra stability. Your summer days will be more enjoyable in these relaxed and casual sandals.

Thickened design of these wedge sandals is stable and wear-resistant, with good resilience and comfortable foot feel without bulky feeling. Lengthening the curve of the calf set off the temperament, fashion, and good match.
